post.body: My bad - I issue a retraction of that tweet. TN?
thanks!
I get the sentiment. My point - it's a larger issue than just saying "Hey Muslims, police thyself"
But you don't have a son ^_^
Early adopters of the service were without caps. It's a growth issue they'll have to solve in time.
back to proposals for a client pitch. Call me Friday and let's chatter. It's a more complex issue a myriad of considerations
in the large sense terrorists are terrorists Muslim-affiliated or IRA. Insurgents as "freedom fighters" is always the op. view
- I haven't seen failwhale in a while ^_^
Twitter put the 2k cap on due to abuse and spammers. The level of service may also have been an issue.
Again less that 1/10th of a percent of the global Ummah (body of Muslims). Mostly in less developed countries.
When I lived in Albany, NY the FBI arrested 5 men that went to our Mosque - almost no one had any idea.
@paigecraig Self-censoring is also largely not plausible when you have angry elements working in private "cells"
"Muslims" as a term is the issue - there is more segmentation in Islam than in the Protestant faith.
I think Victor has an 80% off coupon
this reminds me of the 2 hour discussion we had on Israel: Palestine with the Tel Aviv crew at #TC50
The solution begins with engagement both in the US and abroad. Muslims aren't the issue a few political /religious elements are
I suppose they're as good as pledges to Radio stations these days ^_^

you know Phoebe owns a children's clothing store on the UES.

I actually saw the protest in Pittsburgh. Anonymous organized on the 4chan.org Board - funny no one ever realizes that
